subject: simsonn brake pedal failure
description_text: I connected it as soon as the product arrived, but it's more than 5kg, so it's adding more weight

conversations.body_text: Hi 김세원,    Please open SIMSONN Manager v2.1.3 and follow the steps below to zero and calibrate the pedals:    Click Offset, and follow the instructions in the pop-up dialog to zero the pedal signal;    Click Calibrate, then press each pedal with normal force;    Click Save;    After calibration, test the pedals again — the blue progress bar should move smoothly from 0% to 100%. Only then is the calibration successful.
